commit message: Initial commit
adding a blank main activity
Add navigation options on main landing activity
Enable travis-ci to build project

Merge pull request #1 from brarcher/travis

Start of main landing activity, with travis integration for unit tests

rename activity_main to main_activity

it will be easier to determine what layouts pertain to what
activities.

remove mention of accounts on main landing page

The goal of this application will be to manage budgets, not accounts.
Although there will be an ability to mention an account on
transactions for book keeping purposes, the application will not
maintain a balance in accounts.
Remove default context menu from main activity

Change name of content_main to be more generic

this layout will be used in multiple places, not just the main
activity
Add different densities of images
Add class for managing database, currently supports budgets
Add support for transactions in the database
Remove debug Toast from MainActivity
Add empty BudgetActivity for viewing all budgets
Display budgets on load of BudgetActivity
Add options menu for adding a budget
Add empty activity for adding and viewing a budget
Allow new budget to be created
Allow the add button to launch an empty BudgetViewActivity
Allow BudgetViewActivity to show an existing budget
Add options menu for editing/removing a budget
Allow a budget to be updated
Allow a budget to be deleted
Add empty activity for viewing transactions
Display empty tabs for expenses and revenue transactions
Add empty activity for viewing and editing a transaction
Add options menu for editing or deleting a transaction
Allow a transaction to be deleted
Add transaction tab for expenses
Add transaction tab for revenues
Add options menu for transactions
Allow add button to create a new transaction

Merge pull request #2 from brarcher/budgets-and-transactions

Budgets and transactions

Move junit dependency lower

this will keep test dependencies together later
Add support for robolectric
Rename getBudget() call to reflect it returning incomplete info

Fix value checked to indicate an error

'1' is a perfectly valid value. Instead, '-1' indicates an error.
Sort budgets by name

Remove hello world unit tests

These are not needed
Add methods for counting budgets and transactions
Add unit tests for DBHelper

Merge pull request #3 from brarcher/unit-tests

Unit tests

Move BudgetAdapter to its own file

This way the class can be more easily unit tested

Move TransactionPagerAdapter to its own file

This way the class can be more easily unit tested
Add helper text displayed with no budgets/transactions
Inflate super class's options menu
Change inner DbIds classes to static
Fix SQLiteDatabase leaks

Only place delete option when editing budget/transaction

Originally when a budget and transaction were being viewed they
could be edited or deleted. To help avoid an accidental deletion, move
the delete icon to the editing view.
remove unneeded imports
initial set of unit tests

View budget from start and end of month

Previously the budget was calculated based on the start of
the month from the current time to the current day/time.
Instead, view from the first millisecond of the month
to the last.
Use Calendar.getInstance() instead of GregorianCalendar() directly

Display selected date in BudgetView

This way it will be more intuitive over what time period
the budget information applies.

Additionally, allow the date to be overridden by passing arguments
to the intent.
Add button for changing date in budget view
Add helper for finding date at start/end of month

Let max budget field reflect number of month budgets represents

If budget information is requested which spans multiple months,
let the budget max field be scaled accordingly.

Allow budget date range to be selected

If one clicks the calendar icon, a dialog will now appear.
The dialog allows one to select a start and end date to
be used in displaying the budget.

Merge pull request #4 from brarcher/unit-tests

Unit tests & budget range selection
output failure report on unit test failures
remove usage of emulator, was unused

Attempt to force travis builds on non-container infrastructure

There is an issue with running the travis builds. The root
cause is unknown. Attempting to use the non-container
version of the infrastructure to see if the issue persists.

Merge pull request #6 from brarcher/travis-info

Travis builds on non-container infrastructure
Add classes for importing/exporting to CSV format
Add activity for importing/exporting data
Allow ImportExportActivity to launch from MainActivity

Disable lint for inflating view without parent

A view is being inflated for a dialog. In this case, there is no parent
to assign. Disabling the warning, as it is not relevant in this case

Support for import/export data to CSV
Add additional details to README.md
